summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account transactions for the period from June 1, 2018, to June 30, 2018. It includes information on account balances, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Quarter, 83 St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $398,182.14 on June 1, 2018.
A total of $200,300.00 was transferred out of the account during the statement period.
The ending balance as of June 30, 2018, was $197,882.14.
Service charges included $1.00 for NSF return item fees and $50.00 for overdraft fees.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
